Title: Sword of the Beast
Actors: Mikijirô Hira, Gô Katô, Shima Iwashita, Toshie Kimura
Plot: Gennosuke, a clan retainer, kills one of the clan ministers as part of a plot to achieve reform. He is pursued by his former comrades, each hoping to complete the vendetta put on Gennosuke by the clan. With the help of a master swordsman, Yamane, Gennosuke has a chance at survival.
